type: Legendary Creature – Human Dragon Knight Noble
rules_text:
Flying, deathtouch
[i]Rose's Thorns[/i] – Whenever a creature you control attacks an opponent, that player loses 1 life.
[i]For Nohr[/i] – Whenever Camilla, Bewitching Beauty deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of that players library until they reveal a nonland card. You may cast that card without paying its mana costs.
